contents.text: Welcome to Binti, where we build software in the East Bay to match every child with the best foster family.
For information about our foster care software and partnership opportunities, press 1.
To learn about our child placement technology, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist in child placement technology.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a demo of your child placement software and discuss integration options.
Find out how Binti’s child placement technology works and how I can integrate it into my veteran support programs
I need the API docs and system architecture for your child-placement matching engine to evaluate integration with our case-management system.
I need someone to walk me through how your child placement technology works.
I’d like to learn about the algorithmic framework behind your child-placement platform.

contents.text: To connect with our community partnership team, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our community partnership team.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with your community partnership team about collaborating on foster care initiatives.
Explore forming a community partnership between Binti and my veteran support organization
I’d like to discuss data-sharing protocols and partnership standards with your community partnership team for a cross-agency integration.
I’d like to find out how my community group can partner with you.
I’m interested in exploring collaboration opportunities with your community partnership team.

contents.text: If you are interested in becoming a foster parent or need support services, press 2.
To find out how to become a foster parent, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our foster parent recruitment team.

navigationGoals: I’m interested in becoming a foster parent and need details on eligibility and next steps.
Learn the steps I need to take to become a foster parent after my military service
I want details on your foster-parent recruitment platform’s technical workflow and onboarding process, including authentication and data-security measures.
I need information on how to become a foster parent at my age.
I want to understand the requirements and steps to register as a foster parent.

contents.text: For support services for current foster families, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to foster family support services.

navigationGoals: I need information on support services for current foster families, like respite care and counseling.
Get support resources for my foster family as a veteran caregiver
I’m looking for information on the support-services portal’s API and webhook capabilities to automate resource notifications for foster families.
I’m looking for support services for my current foster family situation.
I’m seeking information on support services available to current foster families.
